invalidate[source]

invalidate(distributionId:str, path:str=`'/'`*)

create a cloudfront invalidation parameters: distributionId:str: distribution id of the cf distribution path:str: path to invalidate, can use wildcard eg. "/*" means all path response: invalidationId:

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
invalidate('E1I41NH6AGDJM8', path='/public/imagenames/*')

'I17JY551XR99VY'
{% endraw %}
